title: Frac
content:
CommentComponent(kind=text, text=From the docs.


frac       ::= empty                               => 0
d:digit q:frac                      => (d + q) / 10
d:digit '' p:digit q:frac          => (d + (p + q) / 10) / 10
hexfrac    ::= empty                               => 0
h:hexdigit q:hexfrac                => (h + q) / 16
h:hexdigit '' p:hexdigit q:hexfrac => (h + (p + q) / 16) / 16
, value=null)
